name: xterm-pty-wasi-polyfill
description: WASI polyfills for connecting WASI apps with xterm-pty

scripts.update_constants: rm -f abi.wasm && ${WASI_SDK_PATH}/bin/clang --sysroot=${WASI_SDK_PATH}/share/wasi-sysroot -o abi.wasm abi.c && wasmtime abi.wasm > src/constants.js && prettier -w src/constants.js

author: Xuejie Xiao
